column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////- didn't meet my expectation (and it could be my fault for imagining how good it is before I get to try others and compare their pizza). From all the pictures on yelp
column5: mine was not gooey (cheese were just solid) and not warm. I'm not sure
column6: but when I looked at others...theirs don't look that gooey either. So is it not supposed to be gooey or today was too busy due to Chicago marathon?
